external_link_confirmation.title: 要打开链接吗？
external_link_confirmation.description: 您想在浏览器中打开 {{link}} 吗？

overview.title: 欢迎使用 Manyverse ！
overview.description: 社交网络可以是简单的，中立的，非商业的和建立在朋友间的信任之上。这就是Manyverse所代表的，并且我们希望你也可以使它成为你的数字之家。新奇的SSB协议使这一切成为可能。

description.1_normal: Manyverse可以使用互联网连接，但是它不是
description.3_normal: 互联网。所有一切都在你的设备中。这就是说你可以在线下正常使用它！你的
description.4_bold: 数据内容都首先储存在你的设备上
description.5_normal: ，你可以在与朋友连接后与他们同步。

description.1_normal: 要与附近的朋友连接并同步内容，您可以连接到相同的
description.3_normal: 。要想在互联网上发现新用户，请寻找邀请码到一

description.1_normal: 由于你的设备托管了你的社交网络，没有其他人可以代替你封禁或删除账号。只有你可以管理你的空间，通过
description.3_normal: 那些你不想在你设备上看到的。然后，你的朋友也可以选择屏蔽这些相同的账号。通过这样审核权被自然分散！

description.1_normal: Once your content is synchronized with friends, they own a copy of it on their devices. Because they could go offline after that, it is
description.3_normal: your content globally from all devices! While this has a bright side of making communities more careful and considerate, it can also put you at risk, so think twice before sharing.
。我们还没有完全熟悉一切，且一些地方需要改进。在同步过程中，软件会出现冻结若干分钟的情况。请保持耐心！请告知我们你遇到的任何程序错误，同时在足够的时间和募捐下，我们可以做出一个非常棒的应用。

setup_account.title: 您是第一次使用吗？
setup_account.description: 您想要创建一个新帐户，还是要用24个单词的恢复短语恢复旧帐户？

migrate.label: 从 ~/.ssb 迁移...
migrate.accessibility_label: 从共享的 SSB 目录迁移账户

migrate.title: 将您的 SSB 帐户迁移到 Manyverse
migrate.description:
Manyverse 在 `~/.ssb` 目录中检测到一个现有的 SSB 帐户。 如果您愿意，您可以将该帐户迁移到只有 Manyverse 才能访问的全新目录。
迁移完成后，**您无法再将您的帐户用于 Patchwork 等其他 SSB 应用程序**，并且 '.ssb' 目录将被**删除**，但您仍然可以通过新帐户使用这些应用程序。
您确认要将您的帐户从'.ssb'迁移到 Manyverse 吗？ **此操作无法撤消。**

link_failed.title: 帐户未准备好
link_failed.description: 您尝试打开 SSB 链接，但您的帐户尚未准备好。 请先完成设置过程，然后再次尝试链接。

empty_onboarding.title: Where is everybody?
empty_onboarding.description:
On Manyverse, you can't search
for people. Someone has to invite you.

empty.title: 无消息
empty.description:
写一篇日记
以便稍后与朋友分享

empty_hashtags.title: No subscribed hashtags
empty_hashtags.description:
Subscribe to hashtags
in the search field to
see some threads here

empty.title: 无对话
empty.description: 与任何朋友开始私信对话

in_common.title: In common
in_common.description: The following list shows accounts you follow who in turn follow {{name}}.

empty.title: 无动态
empty.description:
当人们提及或关注您时，
他们会出现在这里

offline.title: 离线
offline.description:
开启一些网络连接模式
或阅读现有内容

connecting.title: 正在连接
connecting.description:
请等待
应用程序正尝试连接您的节点

no_peers.title: 无网络连接
no_peers.description:
尝试与附近的人同步
或使用服务器邀请代码

scenario_descriptions.offline_with_content: 你不只可以跟其他人建立链接，还能跟他们分享你拥有的内容。
scenario_descriptions.offline_without_content: 您目前无法建立链接。请尝试打开网络链接或者开启Wi-Fi以发现附件的节点。
scenario_descriptions.knows_no_one: 您的Manyverse正在隔离中。您可以请其他人邀请您加入房间，或者自行主持一个房间。
scenario_descriptions.nearby_strangers_available: 您当前没有联系人在线，但在同一个Wi-Fi上发现了一些路人。 如果您相信他们不介意的话，请尝试主动联系他们。
scenario_descriptions.empty_rooms: 您已经加入了一些房间，但是当前没有联系人在线。 您可以主动联系房间中的陌生人，或者获取邀请码以加入更多的房间。
scenario_descriptions.connected_poorly: 您已经与一位路人建立了连接，很好。但是，为了数据的传播更加通畅，不妨建立更多的连接。请稍等片刻，或者获取其他服务器的邀请码。
scenario_descriptions.connected_well: 您已建立了数量可观的连接。一切就绪！他们正在传播您的数据，而您也在参与其中。

recommendation_descriptions.consume_invite:
这个社交网络是基于邀请的，这是为了保持它的纯净，以及避免欺诈。如果您还没有从朋友处得到邀请，可以在网上搜索一些开放邀请的服务器。

可以试试关键词“SSB room server”或“SSB pub server”。超话#ssbroom也可能会有用。

part1.not_connected: 您的好友目前不在线，如果需要更多内容， 您所在的一些房间里有一些路人在线。 可以试试加他们的好友。
part1.connected: 如果您还不满足当前已有的内容，可以去关注更多用户。您所在的一些房间里有一些路人在线。 可以试试成为他们的好友。

follow_staged_manually.part2: 下一屏，您会看到更多这样的路人。点击任意一位，选择“打开个人资料”，然后“关注”。

client_initiated.title: 允许登录吗？
client_initiated.description:
打开 {{room}} 的网站来创建邀请链接并管理成员。 您想要使用Manyverse登录吗？

房间ID是 {{roomid}}

server_initiated.title: 允许登录吗？
server_initiated.description:
网页浏览器正在请求权限来识别您。您想要登录到房间：{{room}} 吗？

房间ID是 {{roomid}}

bluetooth.title: 蓝牙
bluetooth.description: Discover users nearby and connect with them using Bluetooth.

permission_request.title: Allow locating via Bluetooth?
permission_request.message: Manyverse needs to use Bluetooth to discover where you are ("coarse location") and what peers are around you.

wifi.title: 无线局域网
wifi.description: Connect with friends in the same Local Area Network, in other words, friends using the same Wi-Fi.

servers.title: 网络服务器
servers.description: Connect to a so-called 'Pub server' owned by some friend, containing the latest data from multiple accounts.

accessibility_label.connected: 打开这位已连接路人的个人资料页面
accessibility_label.staged: 打开这个推荐连接的个人资料页面

follow_connect.label: Connect and follow
follow_connect.accessibility_label: Connect to this suggested peer then follow them

accessibility_label.peer: Disconnect from this peer and remove it from our database
accessibility_label.room: Disconnect from this room and remove it from our database
从本地数据删除此房间

manage_aliases.label: 修改昵称
manage_aliases.accessibility_label: 管理我在房间服务器中的别名

room_sign_in.label: 登陆网站
room_sign_in.accessibility_label: 打开此房间的网站并登录到其仪表盘，按钮

room_share_invite.label: 分享邀请代码
room_share_invite.accessibility_label: 分享此房间的邀请代码

add.title: 添加备注
add.description: 填写关于此邀请代码的私人注释（仅供您自己使用）。例如：“这是给Alice的”

room.title: SSB房间的邀请代码
room.message: 加入SSB房间“{{name}}”，请粘贴此邀请代码到Manyverse：
room.dialog_note: 将此邀请代码交给朋友

permission_request.title: 是否允许Manyverse录制音频？
permission_request.message: Manyverse需要访问您的麦克风，使您可以编写音频消息

content_warning.title: 内容警告
content_warning.description: 如果您的帖子包含敏感内容，请添加一个简短的注释，提醒人们注意。

image_caption.title: 标题
image_caption.description: 添加此图片的描述，这特别有助于视力障碍者。

text_length.title: Too long
text_length.description:
Your text exceeds the maximum size allowed in SSB messages.

Please make your text smaller or use the replies to publish it in multiple parts.

attachment_size.title: Too large file
attachment_size.description:
The file you are trying to attach exceeds the 5MB limit of SSB blobs.

Please choose a smaller file.

introduction.title:
Your account has
two parts to keep safe

description.1_normal: This is your account's posts, messages, pictures, likes and similar activity. To keep it safe against sudden loss, we use
description.5_normal: or other devices you own. There is
description.7_normal: , just use Manyverse often and your friends are backing you up!

description.1_normal: Your account's "fingerprint" is made up of a highly unique
description.3_normal: . This is a sequence of 24 words that unlocks your account.
description.5_normal: , because if anyone else has access to it, they can take control of your account.
description.7_normal: over it, since you and only you can recover your account!

notifications.new_conversation: This is a new private conversation

thanks.title: 谢谢！
thanks.description:
Development of this app was supported by grants from {{sponsor1}} and {{sponsor2}}, and donations from:

**{{topBackers}}**, and [a hundred more backers]({{donateLink}}). Thanks!

update.title: Check for new versions?
update.description:
Would you like Manyverse to automatically check for new releases?

This setting is optional and will allow Manyverse to send requests to the manyver.se website periodically.

libraries.title: Third party libraries
libraries.description: Manyverse makes use of the following open source libraries and components. We want to thank the authors of these libraries and link to their websites for proper attribution.

dialog_friend_request.title: Friend request
dialog_friend_request.description:
This account is trying to connect with you, but Manyverse prevented it because they are outside your community.

If you recognize this ID, you can press "Follow" to allow them to connect with you.

description.self:
Your content (and related indexes) is occupying {{megabytes}} of storage on your device at the moment.

This number does not include storage occupied by your blobs, such as images and audio messages.
description.others:
{{name}}'s content (and related indexes) is occupying {{megabytes}} of storage on your device at the moment.

This number does not include storage occupied by their blobs, such as images and audio messages.

friends_in_common.zero: Not followed by anyone you're following

blocked.title: Blocked
blocked.description:
You have chosen to stop
interacting with this account

no_self_messages.title: No messages
no_self_messages.description:
Write a diary which you can
share with friends later

no_messages.title: No messages
no_messages.description:
You don't yet have any data
from this account

remove_alias.description:
This action will remove the alias "{{alias}}" from the room server.

People won't be able to reach you any more using this alias.

no_servers.title: No servers
no_servers.description: To register an alias, you need to be a member of some SSB room server. Find one on the internet with the hashtag #ssbroom and make sure it supports aliases.

header.description:
Choose a room server where you would like to register a new alias link for yourself.

Aliases are web addresses that people can use to connect with you.

input_alias.description:
Submit your desired new alias to {{host}} as a single word in lowercase.

For example, if you want the alias "myname.{{host}}", write "myname" below.

failure.title: It didn't work
failure.alias_taken: The alias you submitted is already taken by some user.

instructions.title: Choose members
instructions.description:
Type in the names
of people to join the new chat

none_to_choose.title: No one
none_to_choose.description:
There is nobody in your
community with that name

clear_query.accessibility_label: Reset the Search Query Text Input

initial.title: Search something
initial.description:
Wait while the app is
attempting to connect to your peers

practice.title: Practice
practice.header: Repeat it to confirm it is correct:

correct.title: Correct!
correct.description: Your account's identity is now secure because you know the recovery phrase.

incorrect.title: Incorrect
incorrect.description: Try again: write down your recovery phrase consisting of 24 words separated by whitespace.

description.try_again: Try again by inserting your recovery phrase consisting of 24 words separated by whitespace.
description.overwrite_risk: There is already an account in the app, we cannot overwrite it. If you are sure you want to override, uninstall and re-install Manyverse to recover your account from a clean state.
description.too_short: There are some words missing. Your recovery phrase should be 24 words long.
description.too_long: There are too many words. Your recovery phrase should be exactly 24 words long.
description.wrong_length: Your recovery phrase should be exactly 24 words long.
description.generic: The recovery phrase you gave does not look like a valid identity generated by Manyverse.

header.1_normal: Carefully write down the following recovery phrase on a

show_follows.title: Show follow events
show_follows.subtitle: Show follow or block or unfollow cases on the public board
show_follows.accessibility_label: Toggle follow events on the public board

hops.title: Replication hops
hops.subtitle: How far out in the social graph should Manyverse download data; 1 is friends-only, 2 is friends-of-friends, etc. Caution: the higher this is, the more data is downloaded!

enable_firewall.title: Enable firewall
enable_firewall.subtitle: Prevent strangers from creating network connections with me

blobs_storage.title: Blobs storage limit
blobs_storage.subtitle: Automatically delete old images and blobs until they occupy at most this amount of storage on your device

confirm.title: Rebuild indexes?
confirm.description:
This will reset database indexes and rebuild them, which is a last resort solution in case your database seems to behave oddly. Reindexing may take several minutes.

Are you sure you want to do this?

crash_reports.title: Enable crash reports
crash_reports.subtitle: Opt-in to send crash reports (without personally identifiable information) to the developers, via Sentry.io. By enabling this, you agree to Sentry.io's privacy policy.

confirm.title: Delete your account?
confirm.description:
Deleting this account will bring you back to the start screen, where you can restore your account or create a new one.

Are you sure you want to do this?

restart_required.title: Restart required
restart_required.description: This setting will only enter into effect when you kill the app and restart Manyverse.

trash.title: Trash
trash.description: The trash bin is made of blocked accounts. Compact your database to empty the trash bin.

confirm_compact.title: Compact database?
confirm_compact.description:
This action will remove the trash and rebuild database indexes. It typically lasts 2 minutes, and you must keep the app open without browsing content, waiting for it to complete.

Do you want to continue?

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Every account you see on your Manyverse occupies a certain amount of space on your device. To free up space, you can block accounts you don't want to see anymore.

options_profile.accessibility_label: 此个人资料的更多选项

info.title: What is happening here?
info.description:
Your Manyverse installation has {{bytes}} of content that needs to be optimized before you can browse it. Database indexes help organize content into categories such as posts, reactions, follows, blocks, etc.

The app is busy building those indexes and making sense of them so that when you want to see how many followers an account has, the numbers have already been calculated, and when you want to see who reacted to a post, the list of reactions has already been collected, and so forth.

Typically this doesn't take longer than 10 minutes. Hang in there!

description.3_normal:
is now restored.

Now, to recover your
description.5_normal: , connect with friends that have interacted with you before, to redownload your data from them. There are two ways:

connect_via_wifi.title: Connect via Wi-Fi
connect_via_wifi.description: Just connect this device to the same local Wi-Fi as other devices are, keep Manyverse open on those devices, and your data will automatically sync to this device.

progress.title: Redownloading data: {{megabytes}}
progress.description: Please wait while your data is being recovered from friends.

missing.title: Missing data
missing.description:
You don't yet have data
for the message known by the ID

blocked.title: Blocked thread
blocked.description:
You have chosen to block
the author of this thread

incompatible.title: Sorry
incompatible.description:
This app doesn't know how to process
and display this thread correctly

all.title: All
all.description: This option shows all the threads that were downloaded onto your device.

following.title: Following
following.description: This option shows only threads created by the accounts you follow.

hashtags.title: Hashtags
hashtags.description_1: This option shows only threads that contain a hashtag that you subscribe to.
hashtags.description_2: See all your subscribed hashtags below.
